q_ch: 我们现在有哪些缝纫组，哪些裁剪组？
q_en: What sewing groups and cutting groups do we have now?
gt:
Sure thing! Here are the sewing and cutting groups we currently have:

| Group Type     | Group Name         |
|----------------|--------------------|
| Cutting Group  | Precision Cutters  |
| Sewing Group   | Master Sewers      |
| Cutting Group  | Master Cutters     |
| Cutting Group  | Expert Cutters     |
| Cutting Group  | Professional Cutters|
| Cutting Group  | Advanced Cutters   |
| Sewing Group   | Skilled Sewers     |
| Sewing Group   | Advanced Sewers    |
| Sewing Group   | Premier Sewers     |
| Sewing Group   | Elite Sewers       |

Looks like we have a fantastic lineup of groups! If you need more details, feel free to ask. 😊

steps.sql: SELECT name, type FROM working_group WHERE type IN ('sew', 'cut');
steps.description: Retrieve the names of all sewing and cutting groups

response:
Hello there! 😄 Let's take a look at the sewing and cutting groups we have right now. Here's a handy table for you:

| Group Name          | Type  |
|---------------------|-------|
| Precision Cutters   | Cut   |
| Master Sewers       | Sew   |
| Master Cutters      | Cut   |
| Expert Cutters      | Cut   |
| Professional Cutters| Cut   |
| Advanced Cutters    | Cut   |
| Skilled Sewers      | Sew   |
| Advanced Sewers     | Sew   |
| Premier Sewers      | Sew   |
| Elite Sewers        | Sew   |

I hope this helps! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask. 😊
